sentences.sContent: Any particulate filter eventually clogs, so you have to replace it as breathing becomes difficult.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any particulate filter eventually clogs, so you have to replace it as breathing becomes difficult.
sentences.sCn: 任何微粒过滤器最终会阻塞，所以当感到呼吸困难时，你必须更换它。

sentences.sContent: We tell you not only are they teeming with life, but the planets and stars and the space particulate between are themselves all conscious beings.
sentences.sContent_eng: We tell you not only are they teeming with life, but the planets and stars and the space particulate between are themselves all conscious beings.
sentences.sCn: 我们告诉你，不只那些（有形体）上满布着生命体，而且行星、星体和空间微粒之间也满布着有意识的存有。

trans.tranOther: Particulates are very small particles of a substance, especially those that are produced when fuel is burned
